message:
SYSTEM: 03.Vocabularios-LD_v5.pdf: Página 47
Semantic Technologies in the Web of Data.  Red.es.   4th December 2012 
DC: The Bibliographic Ontology 
•
Dublin Core is a vocabulary to describe resources by means 
of simple and general metadata (DC terms). 
•
A subset of 15 elements (DC elements) has been ratified as 
IETF RFC 5013, ANSI/NISO Standard Z39.85-2007, and ISO 
Standard 15836:2009. 
•
To be used together with other specialized vocabularies to 
meet particular implementation requirements. 
48 
•
http://dublincore.org/documents/2012/06/14/dcmi-terms/?v=terms
speaker: SYSTEM
